reference.shortdesc: A variable name is a placeholder for content that might change based on how something is used, such as a variable supplied to a software application or a user-defined path in a command.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: The content of the varname element is typically rendered in an italic font.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The varname element is specialized from keyword. It is defined in the software domain module.
